title: Simplicial Sets
content: See ~ https://kerodon.net/tag/0004 for introduction to the topological simplex of dimension ` N ` .

blocks.name: k0004lem1
blocks.content: Application of ~ ssin to range of a function. (Contributed by RP, 1-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm k0004lem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wb(wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2)), wf(c3, c4, c0)))
} = {
  syl6rbbr(wceq(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2)), wf(c3, c4, c0), wf(c3, c4, cin(c1, c2)))
  feq3(c0, cin(c1, c2), c3, c4)
  3bitr4i(wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2)), wf(c3, c4, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wa(wss(crn(c3), c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2))), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), cin(c1, c2))))
  pm5.32i(wfn(c3, c4), wa(wss(crn(c3), c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2)), wss(crn(c3), cin(c1, c2)))
  syl6bb(wfn(c3, c4), wa(wss(crn(c3), c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2)), wss(crn(c3), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wss(crn(c3), c1), wss(crn(c3), c2)))
  anbi2d(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2), wss(crn(c3), c2))
  sseq1d(cima(c3, c4), c2, crn(c3), wfn(c3, c4))
  fnima(c3, c4)
  ssin(crn(c3), c1, c2)
  bitri(wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2)), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wa(wss(crn(c3), c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2))), wa(wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2)))
  anbi1i(wf(c3, c4, c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)))
  df-f(c3, c4, c1)
  anass(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1), wss(cima(c3, c4), c2))
  df-f(c3, c4, cin(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm k0004lem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 =(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚Üí(((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2)‚Üî(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c0)))
} = {
  syl6rbbr(c0 =(c1 ‚ãÇ c2), ((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c0), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  feq3(c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2), c3, c4)
  3bitr4i(((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), (c3[Fn]c4 ‚àß(ran(c3)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2)), (c3[Fn]c4 ‚àß ran(c3)‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  pm5.32i(c3[Fn]c4, (ran(c3)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2), ran(c3)‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  syl6bb(c3[Fn]c4, (ran(c3)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2), ran(c3)‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (ran(c3)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ran(c3)‚äÜ c2))
  anbi2d(c3[Fn]c4, ran(c3)‚äÜ c1, (c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2, ran(c3)‚äÜ c2)
  sseq1d((c3 " c4), c2, ran(c3), c3[Fn]c4)
  fnima(c3, c4)
  ssin(ran(c3), c1, c2)
  bitri(((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2), (c3[Fn]c4 ‚àß(ran(c3)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2)), ((c3[Fn]c4 ‚àß ran(c3)‚äÜ c1)‚àß(c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2))
  anbi1i((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2, (c3[Fn]c4 ‚àß ran(c3)‚äÜ c1))
  df-f(c3, c4, c1)
  anass(c3[Fn]c4, ran(c3)‚äÜ c1, (c3 " c4)‚äÜ c2)
  df-f(c3, c4, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
}

blocks.name: k0004lem2
blocks.content: A mapping with a particular restricted range is also a mapping to that range. (Contributed by RP, 1-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm k0004lem2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2)), wb(wa(wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, c0)), wss(cima(c5, c0), c4)), wcel(c5, co(c4, cmap, c0))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2)), wa(wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, c0)), wss(cima(c5, c0), c4)), wcel(c5, co(c4, cmap, c0)), wa(wf(c5, c0, c2), wss(cima(c5, c0), c4)), wf(c5, c0, c4))
  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2)), wb(wa(wf(c5, c0, c2), wss(cima(c5, c0), c4)), wf(c5, c0, c4)), wss(c4, c2), wceq(c4, cin(c2, c4)))
  eqcomd(c4, cin(c2, c4), wss(c4, c2))
  biimpi(wss(c4, c2), wceq(cin(c2, c4), c4))
  sseqin2(c4, c2)
  k0004lem1(c4, c2, c4, c5, c0)
  anbi1d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, c0)), wss(cima(c5, c0), c4), wf(c5, c0, c2))
  elmapd(c5, c2, c0, c3, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2)))
  elmapd(c5, c4, c0, universe, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2)))
  ssexd(c4, c2, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c4, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm k0004lem2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí((c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c0)‚àß(c5 " c0)‚äÜ c4)‚Üî c5 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶]c0)))
} = {
  3bitr4d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c2), (c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c0)‚àß(c5 " c0)‚äÜ c4), c5 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶]c0), ((c5 : c0 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c5 " c0)‚äÜ c4), (c5 : c0 ‚Üí c4))
  3syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c2), (((c5 : c0 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c5 " c0)‚äÜ c4)‚Üî(c5 : c0 ‚Üí c4)), c4 ‚äÜ c2, c4 =(c2 ‚ãÇ c4))
  eqcomd(c4, (c2 ‚ãÇ c4), c4 ‚äÜ c2)
  biimpi(c4 ‚äÜ c2, (c2 ‚ãÇ c4)= c4)
  sseqin2(c4, c2)
  k0004lem1(c4, c2, c4, c5, c0)
  anbi1d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c2), c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c0), (c5 " c0)‚äÜ c4, (c5 : c0 ‚Üí c2))
  elmapd(c5, c2, c0, c3, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c2))
  elmapd(c5, c4, c0, universe, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c2))
  ssexd(c4, c2, c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c2))
  simp2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚äÜ c2)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚äÜ c2)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚äÜ c2)
}

blocks.name: k0004lem3
blocks.content: When the value of a mapping on a singleton is known, the mapping is a completely known singleton. (Contributed by RP, 2-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm k0004lem3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wa(wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c0), c4)), wceq(c5, csn(cop(c0, c4)))))
} = {
  3bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wa(wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c0), c4)), wceq(c5, csn(cop(c0, c4))), wa(wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0))), wss(cima(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c4))), wcel(c5, co(csn(c4), cmap, csn(c0))))
  pm5.32da(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c0), c4), wss(cima(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c4)))
  syl5bb(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0)))), wceq(cfv(c5, c0), c4), wss(cima(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c4)), wss(csn(cfv(c5, c0)), csn(c4)))
  impbii(wceq(cfv(c5, c0), c4), wss(csn(cfv(c5, c0)), csn(c4)))
  syl(wceq(cfv(c5, c0), c4), wss(csn(cfv(c5, c0)), csn(c4)), wceq(csn(cfv(c5, c0)), csn(c4)))
  sneq(cfv(c5, c0), c4)
  eqimss(csn(cfv(c5, c0)), csn(c4))
  snsssn(cfv(c5, c0), c4)
  fvex(c5, c0)
  sseq1d(csn(cfv(c5, c0)), csn(c4), cima(c5, csn(c0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0)))))
  syl2an2(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0))), wceq(csn(cfv(c5, c0)), cima(c5, csn(c0))), wfn(c5, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  elmapfn(c5, c2, csn(c0))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0)))), wcel(c0, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0))))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  fnsnfv(c5, csn(c0), c0)
  mp3an2i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wa(wcel(c5, co(c2, cmap, csn(c0))), wss(cima(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c4))), wcel(c5, co(csn(c4), cmap, csn(c0)))), wcel(csn(c0), universe), wcel(c2, c3), wss(csn(c4), c2))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))
  snssd(c4, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))
  k0004lem2(csn(c0), universe, c2, c3, csn(c4), c5)
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, co(csn(c4), cmap, csn(c0))), wceq(c5, csn(cop(c0, c4))), wf(c5, csn(c0), csn(c4)))
  elmap(c5, csn(c4), csn(c0))
  snex(c4)
  snex(c0)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2), wb(wf(c5, csn(c0), csn(c4)), wceq(c5, csn(cop(c0, c4)))))
  fsng(c0, c1, c4, c2, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm k0004lem3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })‚àß(c5 ` c0)= c4)‚Üî c5 = { < c0, c4 > }))
} = {
  3bitrd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), (c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })‚àß(c5 ` c0)= c4), c5 = { < c0, c4 > }, (c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })‚àß(c5 " { c0 })‚äÜ { c4 }), c5 ‚àà({ c4 }[‚Ü¶]{ c0 }))
  pm5.32da((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 }), (c5 ` c0)= c4, (c5 " { c0 })‚äÜ { c4 })
  syl5bb(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)‚àß c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })), (c5 ` c0)= c4, (c5 " { c0 })‚äÜ { c4 }, {(c5 ` c0)} ‚äÜ { c4 })
  impbii((c5 ` c0)= c4, {(c5 ` c0)} ‚äÜ { c4 })
  syl((c5 ` c0)= c4, {(c5 ` c0)} ‚äÜ { c4 }, {(c5 ` c0)} = { c4 })
  sneq((c5 ` c0), c4)
  eqimss({(c5 ` c0)}, { c4 })
  snsssn((c5 ` c0), c4)
  fvex(c5, c0)
  sseq1d({(c5 ` c0)}, { c4 }, (c5 " { c0 }), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)‚àß c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })))
  syl2an2((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 }), {(c5 ` c0)} =(c5 " { c0 }), c5[Fn]{ c0 }, c0 ‚àà { c0 })
  elmapfn(c5, c2, { c0 })
  syl(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)‚àß c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })), c0 ‚àà { c0 }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  simpl1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 }))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  fnsnfv(c5, { c0 }, c0)
  mp3an2i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), ((c5 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })‚àß(c5 " { c0 })‚äÜ { c4 })‚Üî c5 ‚àà({ c4 }[‚Ü¶]{ c0 })), { c0 } ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà c3, { c4 } ‚äÜ c2)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c2)
  snssd(c4, c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  simp3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c2)
  k0004lem2({ c0 }, universe, c2, c3, { c4 }, c5)
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), c5 ‚àà({ c4 }[‚Ü¶]{ c0 }), c5 = { < c0, c4 > }, (c5 : { c0 } ‚Üí { c4 }))
  elmap(c5, { c4 }, { c0 })
  snex(c4)
  snex(c0)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c2, ((c5 : { c0 } ‚Üí { c4 })‚Üî c5 = { < c0, c4 > }))
  fsng(c0, c1, c4, c2, c5)
}

blocks.name: k0004val
blocks.content: The topological simplex of dimension ` N ` is the set of real vectors where the components are nonnegative and sum to 1. (Contributed by RP, 29-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm k0004val(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), crab(s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s2, cn0, crab(s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(s2, c0, cn0, c1, crab(s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1)), crab(s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1)))
  rabeqbidv(s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(s2), c0), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1))
  oveq2d(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  eqeq1d(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1, csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  sumeq1d(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  oveq2d(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), co(c0, caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s2), c0, caddc, nat1)
  rabex(s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1))
  ovex(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.cn0.s(s2)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat1))
  diff.co.s(s2, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.co.s(s2, nat0, cicc, nat1)

  diff.csu.s(s2, s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

blocks.name: k0004ss1
blocks.content: The topological simplex of dimension ` N ` is a subset of the real vectors of dimension ` ( N + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by RP, 29-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm k0004ss1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wss(cfv(c1, c0), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn0, crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl6ss(cfv(c1, c0), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  eqsstrd(cfv(c1, c0), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1)), wcel(c0, cn0))
  k0004val(s1, s2, s0, c0, c1)
  rabssdv(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(s1), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1))
  mp2an(wss(co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cr, universe), wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cr))
  reex()
  unitssre()
  mapss(cr, universe, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cmap.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: k0004ss2
blocks.content: The topological simplex of dimension ` N ` is a subset of the base set of a real vector space of dimension ` ( N + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by RP, 29-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm k0004ss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wss(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn0, crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {

  ssrabdv(hs0, co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))
  ssidd(co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  fdmfifsupp(cv(hs0), nat0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cr, cr, wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wf(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cr))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), cr, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  fzfid(nat1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))))
  0red(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), crab(hs0, co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), universe))
  ovex(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  rrxbase(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), universe, cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  eqid(cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cn0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
}

blocks.name: k0004ss3
blocks.content: The topological simplex of dimension ` N ` is a subset of the base set of Euclidean space of dimension ` ( N + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by RP, 29-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm k0004ss3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wss(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cehl, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn0, crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  sseqtrd(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cehl, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  k0004ss1(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(co(cr, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cfv(cbs, cfv(cehl, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn0))
  peano2nn0(c0)
  ehlbase(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cehl, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  eqid(cfv(cehl, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
}

blocks.name: k0004val0

blocks.origin:

  eqtri(crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1)), csn(csn(cop(nat1, nat1))), crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, csn(nat1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat1), nat1)))

  ax-mp(wceq(crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1)), crab(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, csn(nat1)), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1))), wceq(co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1))), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, csn(nat1))))

  rabeq(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1))), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, csn(nat1)), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1))
  rabbiia(s1, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, csn(nat1)), wceq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat1), nat1))

  syl5eq(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s1), nat1), csu(s2, csn(nat1), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s1), co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, csn(nat1))))
